TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlMethodAttribute extends Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFunctionAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class SqlMethodAttribute Inherits SqlFunctionAttribute

summary.span: 指示用户定义类型 (UDT) 的方法或属性的确定性和数据访问性质。

span.span: Indicates the determinism and data access properties of a method or property on a user-defined type (UDT).

summary.span: 该特性的属性反映了向 SQL Server 注册该类型时所使用的实体特性。

span.span: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical characteristics that are used when the type is registered with SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于属性, 应直接在 setter 或 getter 上使用。For a property, the should be used on the setter or the getter directly. 继承自, 因此继承了和`FillRowMethodName` `TableDefinition` 中的字段。 inherits from a , so inherits the `FillRowMethodName` and `TableDefinition` fields from . 请注意, 虽然这些字段的名称可能会表明可能, 但不能编写表值方法。Note that it is not possible to write a table-valued method, although the names of these fields might suggest that it is possible. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个 UDT 方法, 该方法具有以下特性: 指示将不会在类型的 null 实例上调用方法, 方法不会更改类型的状态, 并且在参数为时`null`将不会调用该方法提供给方法调用。The following example shows a UDT method that is attributed to indicate that the method will not be invoked on null instances of the type, that the method will not change the state of the type, and that the method will not be called when `null` parameters are supplied to the method invocation. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlMethodAttribute Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlMethodAttribute Sample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlMethodAttribute Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlMethodAttribute Sample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 用户定义类型 (UDT) 的特性，用于指示 UDT 的方法或属性的确定性和数据访问性质。

span.span: An attribute on a user-defined type (UDT), used to indicate the determinism and data access properties of a method or a property on a UDT.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool InvokeIfReceiverIsNull { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.InvokeIfReceiverIsNull : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示 SQL Server 是否应在 null 实例上调用此方法。

span.span: Indicates whether SQL Server should invoke the method on null instances.

value.span: 如果 SQL Server 应在 null 实例上调用此方法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if SQL Server should invoke the method on null instances; otherwise, .

value.span: 如果无法调用方法 (由于方法上的属性), 则返回 SQL Server 。

span.span: If the method cannot be invoked (because of an attribute on the method), the SQL Server is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `InvokeIfReceiverIsNull`属性的默认值为`false`。The default value of the `InvokeIfReceiverIsNull` property is `false`. 也就是说, 不会在 null 实例上调用方法。That is, the method is not invoked on a null instance. 如果`InvokeIfReceiverIsNull` 为`true`, 则方法的返回值取决于其类型。If `InvokeIfReceiverIsNull` is `true`, the return value of the method depends upon its type. 如果该方法的返回类型可以为 null, 则返回该类型的可分辨 null 值。If the return type of the method is nullable, the distinguished null value for the type is returned. 如果返回类型不可以为 null, 则返回该类型的默认 CLR 值。If the return type is non-nullable, the default CLR value for the type is returned. 引用类型的默认值为`null`。The default value for reference types is `null`. 值类型的默认值是调用类型的无参数构造函数时返回的值。The default value for a value type is the value that is returned when you call the parameterless constructor for the type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsMutator { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsMutator : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示用户定义类型 (UDT) 的方法是否为转变器。

span.span: Indicates whether a method on a user-defined type (UDT) is a mutator.

value.span: 如果该方法是转变器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method is a mutator; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将`true`属性设置为, 并且该方法的返回类型为, `void`则 SQL Server 会将方法标记为赋值函数。 If the property is set to `true` and the return type of the method is `void`, SQL Server marks the method as a mutator. 赋值函数方法是导致 UDT 实例中的状态发生更改。A mutator method is one that causes a state change in the UDT instance. 可在赋值语句或数据修改语句中调用赋值函数方法, 但不能在查询中使用。Mutator methods can be called in assignment statements or data modification statements, but cannot be used in queries. 如果方法被标记为赋值函数但不返回 void, 则 CREATE TYPE 不会失败并出现错误。If a method is marked as a mutator but does not return void, then CREATE TYPE does not fail with an error. 即使除之外`void`的返回值不会引发错误, 返回的值也不可访问, 因此无法使用。Even though a returned value other than `void` does not raise an error, the returned value is not accessible and cannot be used. 属性的默认值为`false`。The default value of the property is `false`. 如果在资源库中使用并且设置为`true`, 则属性可以是赋值函数。A property can be a mutator if is used on the setter and is set to `true`. 但是, 属性 setter 将隐式视为赋值函数, 因此不需要将的 属性设置为`true`。However, a property setter is implicitly treated as a mutator, so it is not necessary to set the property of the to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OnNullCall { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.OnNullCall : bool with get, set

summary.span: 在方法调用中使用 输入参数时指示是否调用用户定义类型 (UDT) 上的方法。

span.span: Indicates whether the method on a user-defined type (UDT) is called when input arguments are specified in the method invocation.

value.span: 如果 输入参数在方法调用中指定时，调用了该方法，则为 ；如果任意输入参数为 时，该方法返回了 值，则为 。

span.span: if the method is called when input arguments are specified in the method invocation; if the method returns a value when any of its input parameters are .

value.span: 如果无法调用方法 (由于方法上的属性), 则返回 SQL Server 。

span.span: If the method cannot be invoked (because of an attribute on the method), the SQL Server is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的默认值为`true`。The default value of the property is `true`.
